                    Video Thumbnails Maker Version. 1.0.0.9



Video Thumbnails Maker will enable you to create thumbnails (previews, caps,) of your video files. 

The utility can be used for home-video cataloging and for network video sharing support. 

Here are some key features of "Video Thumbnails Maker":

Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Supports of the batch processing of videofiles.
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Supports of practically any videos-formats (even MOV, QT, FLV, SWF, RM if you have appropriate codecs#. 
If the file can be normally played in your video-player #Windows Media Player or other one#, it can be processed 
by the program.
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· You can pause/continue or stop active job at any moment.
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Possibility to save each shot in separate file.
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Import and export options presets.
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Options preset file format #*.vtm#. After you run the preset, the program is automatically opened 
with the imported tuning. Very useful.
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· 5 interface languages #English, Belarusian, Russian, Ukranian, German#.
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· 5 customizable "base"-presets.
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Statistics of the progress of the program #F1 window#.
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Watermarks #alpha-channels and transparency are supported#. Make your own style.
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Ability to use your images as background images for preview.
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Autoadjustment of height of a shot option.
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Global stroke and stroke tiles options.
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Fit screen option #autoadjustment of the shots to fit your screen resolution#.
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Special effects #drop shadow, gray scale, cut edges#.
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Customizable fonts, colors, contours, shadows, frames, background, text.
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Stamp time in shots option #5 different locations, transparency, contour#.
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Video information stamp option #4 different locations and customizable configurations#.
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· "Audio/Video info" option.
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· "Custom comment" option.
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Two rendering engines #Engine 2 is recommended to be used under 64-bit OS#.
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· "Try to substitute black frames" option.
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· The program&#039;s small size.
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Hot keys.


Requirements:

Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Microsoft .NET Framework 2.0


What&#039;s New in This Release:

Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Splash-screen during the startup.
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· New "Contour type" selector for the Time stamp #F2#.
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Now you can choose between JPG, BMP and PNG file formats #F3#.
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Presets are updated. New default preset. Preset #1 and Preset #5 have been exchanged.
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Input focus improvement for the "Comment" string in the Options window.
